page.title: 19FOOD CHOICES IN PORTCHESTER
page.content: We asked some children in our school some questions on food. The most popular meal was fish and chips. A lot of children said they ate large amounts of food. The least popular foods were vegetables and liver. Most people ate cereal for breakfast, had three meals, with sandwiches for lunch and their main meal at teatime. One little girl liked sugar sandwiches. We asked parents some questions on food. One of the questions was " What would you have if you went out for a meal?" The most popular answer was steak and chips. The least popular food was liver, kidneys and snails. Most parents have two meals a day. Parents mostly have meat or salad. A lot of parents were not fussy about their food. Every parent liked foreign food apart from one.
